candidate_text: There is where technology comes in - a few years ago a brilliant app was created called 'MyFitnessPal'.
That’s where Glucagon Alert steps in â€“ an automated app that helps you keep tabs on your insulin, diet and vital health metrics effortlessly.
There are apps that can help you with that too!
Keeping track of daily blood sugars, medications, food intake, exercise and other health related items can make your head spin.
However, continuous glucose monitoring system has revolutionized diabetic tracking by automating this particular aspect.
One has to measure blood glucose every single time they consume food or go without eating for a while.
Recording blood sugars every few hours, day after day, month in and out, can be tedious.
This week I spoke with Tom Lien about an interesting new app he’s built that helps you monitor blood sugar levels and more.
From monitoring insulin levels to remembering appointments and test results, there's a lot to keep in mind.
We want a way to make tracking easier and more convenient for people."
